Dear {!Contact.FirstName} {!Contact.LastName}:
You are receiving this message because you recently completed a LegalZoom Living Trust order in which you gave specific directives concerning life support and/or health care.
Perhaps you may be interested in a different document that we provide in addition to your Living Trust. In fact, many of our customers who order a Living Trust, also order a Living Will to protect themselves on all levels, and gain added peace of mind.
A Living Trust and a Living Will are two distinct documents, both extremely important.
A Living Trust ensures that your wishes regarding your estate are carried out while avoiding probate court. For more information, click here:
http://www.legalzoom.com/law_library/living_trust/vs.html
A Living Will goes into effect if you are rendered unconscious and unable to communicate your wishes regarding life support and care. The LegalZoom Living Will comes standard with a Health Care Power of Attorney which also allows you to nominate someone to make these decisions for you if you are incapacitated. For more information, click here:
http://www.legalzoom.com/law_library/living_wills/introduction.html
Should you have any additional questions or concerns, please do not hesitate to contact us at 800-773-0888 or at customersupport@legalzoom.com. Thank you.
The LegalZoom Team
